vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (patch_1.sol#22-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_1.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_1.sol#27)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (patch_1.sol#22-32):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_1.sol#26-30)
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_1.sol#28)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (patch_1.sol#26-30)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_1.sol#29)
